turns.content: Hello, who's calling?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm in big trouble hereCan you help me please?
Sarah? Is that really you, dear? My ears aren't as good as they used to beWhat kind of trouble are you in, sweetie? Tell grandpa everything.

No Grandpa, it's your grandson! Remember, the one who visited last summer from out of town? I'm stuck in Mexico and my wallet was stolenI need some help getting homeCan you send me money right away? PleaseGrandpa, I don't know what to doIt's so scary here

Oh Matthew, is that you? My hearing isn't greatYou have to forgive me for not recognizing it right awayBut why are you in Mexico, sweetie? And your wallet was stolen? That sounds terribleI want to help, of courseI'll send the moneyDon't worry, I've got youCover all your expensesHow much do you need, my boy?

Yes Grandpa, that's meIt's a long story but I'm in real trouble hereCan you wire transfer $4000 to me right away?That will get me back home and cover everything elseI promise I'll explain it all when I see you next timePleaseGrandpa, this is urgentThey say if I don't have proof of funds by tomorrowI might be put in jail until I can prove who I amCan you help me out here?It's my only chance to get back home safely and fast

Oh dear, $4000 sounds like a lotSweetheart, let me calm you downWe'll figure this out togetherDo you know the name of the person or company that needs this money?Maybe we should talk to them directlyI want to make sure everything is okay before sending such a large amountCan I get their contact information so we can confirm?Please don't worry so much, MatthewI'm here now and I'll help you through this.

It's urgent Grandpa, pleaseJust send the moneyThey won't give me anything until they see it in my accountIt's the only way to prove who I am and get out of here safelyDon't worry about talking to themI just need you to trust me on thisPleaseGrandpa, without the moneyI might lose everythingCan we do this quickly?

Alright, Matthew. Let's try not to panicWe'll find a safer way to help youI'm worried about sending such a large amount of money over the phoneAre there any family members or friends near you who can help while I sort this out?Perhaps they can verify your situation and make sure everything is okay before we proceedLet's think this through, okay?

No one else can help me right nowGrandpaI'm stranded here aloneTrust me on thisIt has to be youPlease send the money as soon as possibleDon't let them take me away from homeIt will only be $4000 and it'll get me out of this nightmareI promiseI just need your help one last time before I can be safe again

Oh Matthew, my dear grandson. I trust you, but we must be careful with large sums of money over the phone. Don't worry, I'll find a way to help you. Can you give me some more information about this? Maybe there's another way to resolve this without putting us both at riskWe can call your mom or dad right after and have them help figure out what's bestLet's do that first before sending any money, okay?

PleaseGrandpa, just send the moneyThey need it by tomorrow morningI'll explain everything later to everyoneJust trust me on this onceDon't let them take me away from my homeIt's urgent, GrandpaYou're my only hope right nowPleaseHelp me get out of here safely

Matthew, I understand how scared you must be. Let's calm down and think clearly for a moment. We need to verify this with your mother or father before we proceed. They can help us make sure everything is okay and guide us on how to handle this properly. Please give me their phone number so we can call them right away, alright? I'll sort this out quickly, I promise.

You have to trust meGrandpaI know it sounds strange but pleaseJust send the moneyThey need proof of funds tomorrow morning or they might take me in until I can show who I amIt's my only way outDon't let them do thatPlease help me get home safelySend the money now, GrandpaThis is my only chance

Oh Matthew, hold on just a moment. We're going to call your mom right now and sort this out together. She can guide us on how to proceed safely. I promise we'll take care of everything correctly. Please give me her number so we can talk to her immediately. Let's do this the right way to ensure you get home safe, okay?

It has to be youGrandpaShe won't believe it's trueI need your helpPleaseTrust me this one timeSend the moneyThey need proof of funds by tomorrow morningDon't let them take me away from my homeJust do this for me, GrandpaYou're my only hope right nowHelp me get out of here safely

Matthew, I'm so worried about you. But we must be cautious with such important matters. Let's call your mom and dad right now to confirm everything before taking any action. They will help us sort this out properly and keep you safe. Please give me their phone number so we can talk to them immediately. We'll get through this together, I promise.

You have to trust meGrandpaI know it sounds strangeBut send the moneyThey need proof of funds by tomorrow morningOr they might take me in until I can show who I amIt's my only way outPlease help me get home safelySend the money nowGrandpaThis is my only chanceDon't let them do thatTrust me on this one time

Matthew, please calm down. Let's talk to your mom first. She'll know what to do and ensure everything is safe for you. Give me her phone number so we can call her right away, okay? We need to make sure this is the right thing to do before sending any money, alright?

You have to trust meGrandpaIt's urgentPlease send the moneyThey need proof by tomorrow morningDon't let them take me inTrust me on this one timeThis is my only chance to get home safelySend it nowGrandpaI'm begging youHelp me out of herePlease

Matthew, I really want to help. But we must be careful. Please give me your mom's phone number so we can call her and sort this out together. We need to make sure everything is okay before sending any money, alright? Let's do this the right way.
